title: 【mythicmob】新人小白求问
author: Ducknessss
txt_content:
启动mythicmob 时会出现以下问题代码反馈 可否请大佬们解答一下 谢谢[MythicMobs] Error with 'GLOW' skill: The GLOW Effect requires GlowAPI and the 'color' attribute must be a valid GlowAPI Color.
[09:52:52 WARN]: [MythicMobs] -- Incorrect line: effect:glow{color=BLACK;duration=999} @Self
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] WARNING: HashCode collision detected when loading mobs.
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Mob 1 Hash: -1998092634 Type: SkeletalKnight
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Mob 2 Hash: -1998092634 Type: SkeletalKnight
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] We recommend changing one of these mobs' internal name to avoid issues resolving mob type.复制代码[09:52:53 ERROR]: [MythicMobs] Could not load MythicMob 南帝王护使! Invalid type specified.复制代码[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Could not find AbstractSkill 赤王出场1
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Could not find AbstractSkill 赤世九重天
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Could not find AbstractSkill 赤王狂怒
[09:52:53 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Could not find AbstractSkill 赤王陨云星复制代码[09:53:20 WARN]: [MythicMobs] ?[33m Config Error for Drop '[4msx 白1 1 0.03[0m[33m' in 'C:\Users\Duck\Desktop\超脱无极\plugins\MythicMobs\Mobs\mob\副本\哥布林.yml': [37mDrop type not found.[0m[0m
[09:53:20 WARN]: [MythicMobs] ?[33m Config Error for Drop '[4msx 白2 1 0.03[0m[33m' in 'C:\Users\Duck\Desktop\超脱无极\plugins\MythicMobs\Mobs\mob\副本\哥布林.yml': [37mDrop type not found.[0m[0m
复制代码

replies.author: gfjhf
replies.txt_content:
第一个是需要1.9+才能用发光效果
第二个是物品的Type设置错了 请发一下相关的配置文件看看
第三个是你在怪物的配置文件里注册了这个技能但技能文件夹没找到 
第四个是找不到这个掉落物（可能缺失了相应文件）

replies.author: Ducknessss
replies.txt_content: 好哒 谢谢已经解决
